TITLE.LOCALISED_TEXT: Estrépito de la horda de fuego

FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: La venganza en forma de estampida.
Rache auf viel zu vielen Beinen.
La vendetta sotto forma di un branco di bisonti in carica.

SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Put a 5/5 black and red Elemental creature token onto the battlefield. Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each black creature you control, then sacrifices a land for each red creature you control.

Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 5/5 noire et rouge Élémental. L’adversaire ciblé sacrifie une créature pour chaque créature noire que vous contrôlez, puis il sacrifie un terrain pour chaque créature rouge que vous contrôlez.

Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Elemental negra y roja 5/5. El oponente objetivo sacrifica una criatura por cada criatura negra que controlas, luego sacrifica una tierra por cada criatura roja que controlas.

Bringe einen 5/5 schwarzen und roten Elementarwesen-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Ein Gegner deiner Wahl opfert eine Kreatur für jede schwarze Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, und opfert dann ein Land für jede rote Kreatur, die du kontrollierst.

Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Elementale 5/5 nera e rossa. Un avversario bersaglio sacrifica una creatura per ogni creatura nera che controlli, poi sacrifica una terra per ogni creatura rossa che controlli.
黒であり赤である５/５のエレメンタル・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。 そのプレイヤーは、あなたがコントロールする黒のクリーチャー１体につきクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げ、その後あなたがコントロールする赤のクリーチャー１体につき土地を１つ生け贄に捧げる。
상대 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 흑색이고 적색인 5/5 정령 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 상대는 당신이 조종하는 흑색 생물 한 개당 생물 한 개를 희생하고 당신이 조종하는 적색 생물 한 개당 대지 한 개를 희생한다.

Положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 5/5 черный и красный Элементаль. Целевой оппонент жертвует одно существо за каждое черное существо под вашим контролем, затем жертвует одну землю за каждое красное существо под вашим контролем.

Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura preta e vermelha 5/5 do tipo Elemental. O oponente alvo sacrifica uma criatura para cada criatura preta que você controla e então sacrifica um terreno para cada criatura vermelha que você controla.
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_ELEMENTAL_5_5_281522", token_count, EffectController() ) end
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS + FILTER_TYPE_OPPONENTS) filter:SetOwner( EffectController() ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddColour( COLOUR_BLACK ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = filter:Count() EffectDC():Set_Int(1, total) local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if player ~= nil then filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:NotTargetted() player:SetTargetCount( total ) for i=0,total-1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE" ) end player:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(2) ) end

local total = EffectDC():Get_Int(1) local target_dc = EffectDC():Get_Targets(2) local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if player ~= nil then if target_dc ~= nil then for i=0,total-1 do local target_card = target_dc:Get_CardPtr(i) if target_card ~= nil then target_card:Sacrifice(player) end end end end

local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddColour( COLOUR_RED ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = filter:Count() EffectDC():Set_Int(3, total) local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if player ~= nil then filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:NotTargetted() player:SetTargetCount( total ) for i=0,total-1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_LAND_TO_SACRIFICE" ) end player:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(4) ) end

local total = EffectDC():Get_Int(3) local target_dc = EffectDC():Get_Targets(4) local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if player ~= nil then if target_dc ~= nil then for i=0,total-1 do local target_card = target_dc:Get_CardPtr(i) if target_card ~= nil then target_card:Sacrifice(player) end end end end
